Package airportsProject.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AirlineDetailsController
    Airline Details page Shows the details for an airline like its fleet, its size and the list of airplanes that it got
    AirlinesController
    Shows all the airlines existent and lets the user create a new one and remove an airline or see its details
    AirplaneDetailsController
    Shows a certain airplane details aswell as options to edit or remove it, and it's flight history
    AirplanesController
    List of existent airplanes In this page the user can search for an airplane by its ID, name, airline, the code of the airport where the plane is parked and their model the user can add and remove an airplane and see details of it
    AirportDetailsController
    Shows the details of an airport Among its personal info, it shows its location on the map, the user can edit and remove the airport is lists the parked planes there, the flight history and the connections available from there.
    AirportNetworkController
    Network of airports, shows a map of the location of all available airports, the user can set a new flight by choosing two points on the map the user can see the graph with all the connections available among all the airport on the lower left corner and choose a filter by continent on the lower right corner of the map.
    FlightDetailsController
    Shows the route the flight will take among other infos like detailed informations for each connection, the duration (total and for connection) and the airplane used for the flight
    FlightsController
    Lists all the flights realized by date It is possible to search for flights in a period of time, aswell as for the origin or destination airport code, the number of passengers transported, the total distance of the flight, its cost and for the number of connections of a flight
    LandingPageController
    Landing page of the GUI of the project here are the option to load a program or start a new one loading a program can be from a text or a binary file
    MainGUI
    MainGUI application class It sets the scene and handles the showing of the first page
    MainGUIController
    MainGUI controller class for the entire layout.
    MenuController
    Menu page responsible for the flow of the application Options are: Airport network, airplanes, airlines, flights, statistics and save the current program
    NewAirlineDialogController
    Dialog window to insert OR edit an airline
    NewAirplaneDialogController
    Dialog window to insert OR edit an airplane
    NewAirportDialogController
    Dialog window to insert OR edit an airport
    NewConnectionDialogController
    Dialog window to insert a new connection between two airports
    NewFlightDialogController
    Dialog window to insert a new flight
    StatsController
    Page for showing some statistics for airports and flights
    VistaNavigator
    Utility class for controlling navigation between vistas.
